item.description:
Let's Eat at an authentic Portuguese restaurant while listening to the beautiful mellow music of Receita de Samba, which they begin playing around 8:00 PM.

After I returned from Brazil, I had a wonderful dining experience at Sunset Cafe. Delicious food, amazing music, and outstanding service.

We will dine family style, which means platters with a variety of tasty dishes will passed around the tables. The cost will be about $25 and includes; appetizers, soup, a fish and a seafood entree, a beef entree as well as a chicken and pork entree, soda, coffee, dessert, tip and tax. It may be possible to order from the standard menu as well. The menu details will be available on Friday. Please let me know by 5:00 PM Friday September 26th if you want vegetarian fare.

Check out the Sunset Cafe menu

Listen to the music of Receita de Samba

The Portuguese Meetup Group will be joining us as well, so perhaps you'll pick up a few words.


Before I list the Rules of Engagement please understand the NO-SHOW policy was established to ensure everyone who wants to join can and it has been fairly and strictly enforced.

I want to assure you I do understand if you've RSVPd YES and you have a sudden change of plans because you're lost, you don't feel well, you have transportation issues, you don't have the money, or you just don't want to be around people. My only request is for you to let me know as soon as possible so we don't worry about you and our reservation is adjusted. As long as you contact me you will not be considered a NO-SHOW.


Rules for Engagement:

If it is less than twenty-fours from the meal and you are not able to attend or are running late, you MUST call or text me at 617 445-7549.

Please be considerate of your fellow diners time by arriving promptly.

Please bring enough cash to pay for your meal, drinks, tip, and tax.

All RSVPs are on a first come, first served basis.

You may only RSVP YES or NO. Maybe isn't an option.

Please RSVP YES only if you are certain you will attend.

If you're not sure you can attend because you have other unconfirmed plans or uncertain transportation, please RSVP NO with a comment requesting to be placed on wait list.

If dinner is full and you wish to attend, please RSVP NO with a comment to be wait listed. If there is an overwhelming response, the reservation may be increased or another seating arranged.

If your name appears on the event page as a YES after the dinner and you have not attended, it is counted as a NO-SHOW.

If I change you're RSVP to NO because you haven't replied to final update dinner confirmation email deadline, it is counted as a NO-SHOW.

If any guests you've RSVPd for NO-SHOW it will count as if you've NO-SHOWED.

If you change your RSVP from a YES to a NO within twenty-four hours of the dinner, it is counted as a NO-SHOW.

If you are a NO-SHOW for three events you are removed from the group.

NO-SHOWS impact everyone; from you, who could or has been on the wait list to the organizer as well as the restaurant's who staff based on our reservation.

An email from you explaining your absence is an expected courtesy.

If you are removed and there were extenuating circumstances, please email Tonya about rejoining.

Your feedback is appreciated so, rate the event and venue by completing surveys afterward.

I will arrive at 6:45 PM to confirm seating and will welcome you.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Tonya/Meetup reservation or call/text my cell (617) 445 7549

group.name: Breakfast, Brunch, Lunch, & Dinner Meetup Group

item.name: Sunset Cafe Dinner and Music
